cyclone.name: MATTHEW
cyclone.current_location: about 125 miles SSE of Nassau, Bahamas
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across the Bahamas and forecast to parallel or graze the east coast of Florida, then turn north-northwest toward Georgia and the Carolinas
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just offshore of the east-central Florida coastline (around West Palm Beach to Cape Canaveral)

weather_observation.watch_coast: North of Fernandina Beach FL to Edisto Beach SC (hurricane watch); Chokoloskee to Suwannee River FL (tropical-storm watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Deerfield Beach FL northward to Fernandina Beach FL (hurricane warning); Chokoloskee to Golden Beach FL, Keys east of Seven-Mile Bridge, and Florida Bay (tropical-storm warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern, central, and northwestern Bahamas, eastern Cuba, and much of the Florida east coast
weather_observation.wind: Only occasional gusty rain bands or peripheral squalls possible; sustained tropical-storm-force winds not expected.
weather_observation.rainfall: No significant rainfall forecast for San Juan, PR from MATTHEW.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Long-period swells and dangerous rip currents along north- and east-facing beaches.
